page.title: 17Kilmaurs Gala Week (2)
page.content:
The climax is the Gala Day on the Saturday when the "Queen" is crowned in the local park, following a fancy dress parade.
A well known local person opens the proceedings and the entertainment begins: majorettes, pipe bands, side shows (including stalls run by various groups), are all enjoyed.
Every local child receives a bag containing an assortment of sweets and a voucher to obtain ices from the refreshment van.
The day is rounded off with a Gala Dance and the week rounded off with the "Queen", "Champion", attendants and helper attending the Parish Church for a special Gala Service.
